content:
Sure, here are some additional questions that could be included in a survey about consumer's opinions of Vitaminas:

1. How did you first hear about Vitaminas?
2. Have you noticed any changes in the quality of food or service at Vitaminas over time?
3. How often do you order from Vitaminas delivery service?
4. How would you rate the variety of vegetarian and vegan options at Vitaminas?
5. Have you ever had any issues with your order at Vitaminas? If so, how were they resolved?
6. How important is sustainability and environmental responsibility to you when choosing where to dine out?
7. How would you rate the portion sizes at Vitaminas?
8. How does the pricing at Vitaminas compare to other similar restaurants in your area?
9. Would you like to see Vitaminas offer any new menu items or specials?
10. How would you rate the convenience of ordering and picking up food at Vitaminas?
11. How satisfied are you with the nutritional information provided for menu items at Vitaminas?
12. How does the online ordering process at Vitaminas compare to other restaurants?
13. How does the atmosphere and ambiance of the restaurant affect your dining experience at Vitaminas?
14. Have you ever used any promotions or loyalty programs offered by Vitaminas?
15. How would you rate the speed of service at Vitaminas?
